history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: incl_app_inv. qsimpl time: 1 use: incl_app_inv,in_dec,false,filter,False,true. qsimpl time: 1 use: incl_app_inv,in_dec,false,filter,False,true. qsimpl time: 1 use: incl_app_inv,in_dec,false,filter,False,true. qsimpl time: 1 use: incl_app_inv,in_dec,false,filter,Permutation_app,False,filter_In,true. qsimpl time: 1 use: incl_app_inv,in_dec,false,filter,Permutation_app,False,filter_In,true.

exceptions.tactic: apply incl_app_inv in H as [Hm Hl].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 m : list A), incl (l1 ++ l2) m -> incl l1 m /\\ incl l2 m" on hypothesis of type "incl m (l ++ p)".

exceptions.tactic: exists (filter (fun x => if in_dec (fun _ _ : X => False) x l then true else false) m).
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type l, m, p : list X H : incl m (l ++ p) H0 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 m : list A), incl (l1 ++ l2) m -> incl l2 m H1 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 m : list A), incl (l1 ++ l2) m -> incl l1 m x : ?A x0 : X x1 : X The term "False" has type "Prop" while it is expected to have type "{x0 = x1} + {x0 <> x1}".

exceptions.tactic: exists (filter (fun x => if in_dec (fun _ _ : X => False) x p then true else false) m).
exceptions.exn: In environment H4 : bool X1 : forall A : Type, (A -> bool) -> list A -> list A H3 : bool X0 : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x = y -> False}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {In a l} + {In a l -> False} X : Type l, m, p : list X H : incl m (l ++ p) H0 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 m : list A), incl (l1 ++ l2) m -> incl l2 m H1 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 m : list A), incl (l1 ++ l2) m -> incl l1 m x : ?A x0 : X x1 : X The term "False" has type "Prop" while it is expected to have type "{x0 = x1} + {x0 <> x1}".
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

exceptions.tactic: apply Permutation_app; apply Permutation_reshuffle; apply filter_In.
exceptions.exn: In environment H8 : bool X5 : forall A : Type, (A -> bool) -> list A -> list A H7 : bool X4 : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x = y -> False}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {In a l} + {In a l -> False} H6 : bool X3 : forall A : Type, (A -> bool) -> list A -> list A H5 : bool X2 : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x = y -> False}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {In a l} + {In a l -> False} H4 : bool X1 : forall A : Type, (A -> bool) -> list A -> list A H3 : bool X0 : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x = y -> False}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {In a l} + {In a l -> False} X : Type l, m, p : list X H : incl m (l ++ p) H0 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 m : list A), incl (l1 ++ l2) m -> incl l2 m H1 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 m : list A), incl (l1 ++ l2) m -> incl l1 m Unable to unify "?M4925 ++ ?M4926 ~p ?M4927 ++ ?M4928" with "exists m1 m2 : list X, m ~p m1 ++ m2 /\\ incl m1 l /\\ incl m2 p".
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

original: intro H. apply incl_app_inv in H as [Hm Hl]. exists (filter (fun x => if in_dec (fun _ _ : X => False) x l then true else false) m). exists (filter (fun x => if in_dec (fun _ _ : X => False) x p then true else false) m). split. - apply Permutation_app; apply Permutation_reshuffle; apply filter_In. - split; apply filter_In; auto.
